prompts: Create a flower-themed Pokemon that uses nature to defeat its foes.
I want a Pokemon that embodies elegance and has poison abilities.
Generate a Pokemon with beautiful petals and strong, vibrant colors.
Make a dual-type Pokemon that thrives in forests and gardens.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines grass and poison with striking features.
Design a Pokemon that is graceful yet powerful in battle.
Show me a Pokemon that has a whimsical appearance and a toxic touch.
